title: bitcoin_mining
author: bitcoin_mining
content: Every time I come to the forum my account is active.We try to be active on the forum almost every day.My Question??If we are active after 30 days and how can we find out the IP address of our active in these 30 days or from where.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: To know your IP logs on this forum in the last 30 days, click on this linkhttps://bitcointalk.org/myips.phpYou do not have to wait for 30 days before you can use the link to know your IP logs, you can start using it immediately at anytime.

comments.author: AirtelBuzz
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoin_mining on December 16, 2023, 11:58:59 AMEvery time I come to the forum my account is active.We try to be active on the forum almost every day.My Question??If we are active after 30 days and how can we find out the IP address of our active in these 30 days or from where.To know how to check your IP address, you first need to go to your profile.To check this you first open your bitcoin account profile then follow this instruction you will get your 30 days login IPs

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoin_mining on December 16, 2023, 11:58:59 AMIf we are active after 30 days and how can we find out the IP address of our active in these 30 days or from where.As others have mentioned, you can find a link to Your logged IPs for the last 30 days in your account related settings of your forum profile. But unless you've been keeping your own records of them outside the forum, that's as far back as you can view your IPs through your account.Â  Just the last 30 days are available in your profile settings.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 16, 2023, 12:00:54 PMTo know your IP logs on this forum in the last 30 days, click on this linkhttps://bitcointalk.org/myips.phpYou do not have to wait for 30 days before you can use the link to know your IP logs, you can start using it immediately at anytime.theymos announced it in Retention/privacy info.More details about privacy policy of the forum https://bitcointalk.org/privacy.phpYou can customize your account settings: Account related settings: Limit IP retention: Tick it.
